item.description:
The Ira’s Singles Events is Happy to make you laugh, smile and have fun. See details below:



CARE TO LAUGH?? TO SMILE??





CARE TO HAVE FUN??



YOU CAN DO IT ALL FOR FREE!!



FREE TICKETS. FREE TICKETS. FREE TICKETS.



THE HARTFORD FUNNY BONE COMEDY CLUB AND RESTAURANT . Thursday February 25, 7:30 pm.

194 Buckland Drive. Manchester, CT. ( In the Mall) 860-432-8600



Who will make you laugh?



Comedian Jake Iannarino travels coast to coast doing a solo stand up act jam packed with every topic from A-Z and with a few songs you won't forget! He also travels with his 6 man improv group ' The Boss PLayers. Jake has been one of the top requested comedians on the easrt coast armed with his angry sarcasm and his guitar, he has been bringing down the house at clubs and colleges across the U.S. Featured in the 'Hot Chick' and 'The Animal



http://www.hartfordfu...





SMALL PRINT IS BELOW



Neil Joslin and The Ira have 22 Free Tickets. First come, First Served.


Please let me know ASAP if you would like the free ticket. Please let me now if you will be joining us at Pepe’s Pizza. Info below.


Please send your RSVP to: Mistrchrming@aol.com. Subject Line: Free Ticket. Hartford Funny.


We are going to meet at 5:30 PM , at: Pepe’s Pizza- World’s Best Pizza. This is across the street from Funny Bone. Table will be reserved. If you cannot join for Pizza, we will hand out your ticket at 7:15ish in front of the ticket window.


5. Pepe’s Pizza: http://www.pepespizze...
221 Buckland Hills Drive, Manchester, CT 860-644-7333



ALSO:

: 2/11 Thursday. Pre Valentine's Happy Hour at Tango in Glastonbury

: 2/18 Thursday. (Ladies Only) Hey Make Me Over- Look Great for a Date Function

: October 30. Singles Cruise. The Love Boat Sails Again with The Ira
item.how_to_find_us: Large Group of Singles Having Fun. Sign will be posted

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira. Free Tickets for the Hartford Funny Bone Comedy. 2/25. Yes. Free
